Package ispd.motor.workload.impl

package ispd.motor.workload.impl
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ispd.motor.workload
     
    ispd.motor.workload.impl.task
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CollectionWorkloadGenerator
    Represents a workload from a homogeneous collection of other workloads.
    GlobalWorkloadGenerator
    Generates a workload with randomly-decided sizes from a collection of uniform intervals, and evenly distributes the tasks of such workload across all masters in a GridQueueNetwork.
    Some particularities: This class generates task ids sequentially, starting from 0 . This class generates task creation times from an exponential distribution.
    PerNodeWorkloadGenerator
    Generates a workload for a single master node in a GridQueueNetwork.
    Some particularities: This class generates computation and communication sizes with instances of TwoStageUniform, but used as single stage uniforms. This class generates task creation times from an exponential distribution with beta = 5, which may be adapted if the task's owner has id "NoDelay".
    RandomicWorkloadGenerator
    Base class for WorkloadGenerators that involve random generation of task attributes, such as computation and communication size.
    It also standardizes the use of a Supplier<Integer> for generating task ids.
    TraceFileWorkloadGenerator
    Generates a workload from parsing a trace file, and evenly distributes the tasks of such workload among all masters in a GridQueueNetwork.
    Some particularities: How the class interprets information gathered from the trace file about a task depends on its TraceFileWorkloadGenerator.traceType.
